languages.text: "Боюсь, ты уже знаешь ответ на свой вопрос, элантах. Просто не можешь принять его". {n}Ирлиэт смотрит на вас со смесью горечи и... сочувствия?{/n} "Твоя предшественница, что ранее владела этим судном и всем твоим протекторатом. Мон-кай, что хранила в своем кабинете кусок моего родного мира, словно какую-то безделушку, обычный трофей".

traits.locale_text: "Боюсь, ты уже знаешь ответ на свой вопрос, элантах. Просто не можешь принять его". {n}Ирлиэт смотрит на вас со смесью жалости и презрения.{/n} "Твоя предшественница, что ранее владела судном и всем твоим протекторатом. Мон-кай, что хранила в своем кабинете кусок моего родного мира, словно какую-то безделушку, обычный трофей".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "I am afraid you already know the answer, elantach. You just cannot accept it." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a mixture of sorrow and... sympathy?{/n} "Your predecessor, she who previously owned this vessel and your entire protectorate. The mon-keigh who kept a piece of my homeworld in her study, like a trifle or trophy of no great significance."
languages.original_text: "Боюсь, ты уже знаешь ответ на свой вопрос, элантах. Просто не можешь принять его". {n}Ирлиэт смотрит на вас со смесью горечи и... сочувствия?{/n} "Твоя предшественница, что ранее владела этим судном и всем твоим протекторатом. Мон-кай, что хранила в своем кабинете кусок моего родного мира, словно какую-то безделушку, обычный трофей".

traits.locale_text: "I am afraid you already know the answer, elantach. You just cannot accept it." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a mixture of pity and contempt.{/n} "Your predecessor who used to own this vessel and your entire protectorate. The mon-keigh who kept a piece of my homeworld in her study, like a trifle or trophy of no great significance."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am afraid you already know the answer, elantach. traits.locale_text: "I am afraid you already know the answer, elantach. You just cannot accept it." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a mixture of sorrow and... sympathy?{/n} "Your predecessor, she who previously owned this vessel and your entire protectorate. The mon-keigh who kept a piece of my homeworld in her study, like a trifle or trophy of no great significance."

languages.text: 「残念だが、答えはもう知っているのだろう、エランタ。お前はそれを受け入れることができないだけだ」{n}ユリエットが、悲しみと同情の入り混じった表情で見つめてくる。{/n}「お前の前任者は、この船と保護領全体を以前所有していた者。我の故郷の一部を自身の書斎に、何の重要性もないつまらない戦利品のように保管していたモン＝ケイだ」
languages.original_text: "I am afraid you already know the answer, elantach. You just cannot accept it." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a mixture of sorrow and... sympathy?{/n} "Your predecessor, she who previously owned this vessel and your entire protectorate. The mon-keigh who kept a piece of my homeworld in her study, like a trifle or trophy of no great significance."

traits.locale_text: 「残念だが、答えはもう知っているのだろう、エランタ。お前はそれを受け入れることができないだけだ」{n}ユリエットが、悲しみと同情の入り混じった表情で見つめてくる。{/n}「お前の前任者は、この船と保護領全体を以前所有していた者。我の故郷の一部を自身の書斎に、何の重要性もないつまらない戦利品のように保管していたモン＝ケイだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je crains que vous connaissiez déjà la réponse à cette question, elantach. Vous refusez simplement de l'accepter, {n}répond Yrliet d'un air mêlant tristesse et... compassion ?{/n} C'était votre prédécesseure qui, avant vous, possédait ce vaisseau ainsi que votre protectorat tout entier. La mon-keigh qui conservait un fragment de mon monde dans son bureau, comme s'il s'agissait d'une babiole ou d'un trophée sans importance. »
languages.original_text: "I am afraid you already know the answer, elantach. You just cannot accept it." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a mixture of sorrow and... sympathy?{/n} "Your predecessor, she who previously owned this vessel and your entire protectorate. The mon-keigh who kept a piece of my homeworld in her study, like a trifle or trophy of no great significance."

traits.locale_text: « Je crains que vous connaissiez déjà la réponse à cette question, elantach. Vous refusez simplement de l'accepter, {n}répond-elle d'un air mêlant pitié et mépris.{/n} C'était votre prédécesseure qui, avant vous, possédait ce vaisseau ainsi que votre protectorat tout entier. La mon-keigh qui conservait un fragment de mon monde dans son bureau, comme s'il s'agissait d'une babiole ou d'un trophée sans importance. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “恐怕你早就知道答案了，外界人，但你就是不肯接受。”{n}伊莉耶特看着你，目光这带着忧伤与……同情？{/n} “是你的前任行商浪人。无论是你的飞船还是你的王朝，曾经都归她所有。那只猴子把我故乡的碎片摆在书房里，就好像那仅仅是件微不足道的战利品一样。”
languages.original_text: "I am afraid you already know the answer, elantach. You just cannot accept it." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a mixture of sorrow and... sympathy?{/n} "Your predecessor, she who previously owned this vessel and your entire protectorate. The mon-keigh who kept a piece of my homeworld in her study, like a trifle or trophy of no great significance."

traits.locale_text: “恐怕你早就知道答案了，外界人，但你就是不肯接受。”{n}伊莉耶特看着你，目光这带着怜悯和轻蔑。{/n} “是你的前任行商浪人。无论是你的飞船还是你的王朝，曾经都归她所有。那只猴子把我故乡的碎片摆在书房里，就好像那仅仅是件微不足道的战利品一样。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Me temo que ya conoces la respuesta, elantach. Lo que pasa es que te niegas a aceptarla». {n}Yrliet te mira con una mezcla de pesar y... ¿simpatía?{/n} «Era de tu predecesora, la anterior dueña de este navío y de todo tu protectorado. La mon-keigh que guardaba un pedazo de mi mundo natal en su estudio, como si fuese un trofeo o un recuerdo de escasa importancia».
languages.original_text: "I am afraid you already know the answer, elantach. You just cannot accept it." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a mixture of sorrow and... sympathy?{/n} "Your predecessor, she who previously owned this vessel and your entire protectorate. The mon-keigh who kept a piece of my homeworld in her study, like a trifle or trophy of no great significance."

traits.locale_text: «Me temo que ya conoces la respuesta, elantach. Lo que pasa es que te niegas a aceptarla». {n}Yrliet te mira con una mezcla de lástima y desdén.{/n} «Era de tu predecesora, la anterior dueña de este navío y de todo tu protectorado. La mon-keigh que guardaba un pedazo de mi mundo natal en su estudio, como si fuese un trofeo o un recuerdo de escasa importancia».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich fürchte, Ihr kennt die Antwort darauf bereits, Elantach. Aber Ihr akzeptiert sie einfach nicht." {n}Yrliet sieht dich an mit einer Mischung aus Traurigkeit und ... Mitleid?{/n} "Eure Vorgängerin, der dieses Schiff und Euer gesamtes Protektorat vor Euch gehörten. Die Chem-Pan-Sey, die ein Stück meiner Heimatwelt in ihrem Arbeitszimmer aufbewahrte ... als wäre es eine Nichtigkeit oder Trophäe, also völlig bedeutungslos."
languages.original_text: "I am afraid you already know the answer, elantach. You just cannot accept it." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a mixture of sorrow and... sympathy?{/n} "Your predecessor, she who previously owned this vessel and your entire protectorate. The mon-keigh who kept a piece of my homeworld in her study, like a trifle or trophy of no great significance."

traits.locale_text: "Ich fürchte, Ihr kennt die Antwort bereits, Elantach. Ihr könnt sie nur nicht akzeptieren." {n}Yrliet blickt dich mit einer Mischung aus Mitleid und Verachtung an.{/n} "Eure Vorgängerin, der dieses Schiff und Euer gesamtes Protektorat vor Euch gehörten. Die Chem-Pan-Sey, die ein Stück meiner Heimatwelt in ihren Arbeitszimmer hatte, als wäre es dekorativer Tand oder eine unbedeutende Trophäe."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "I am afraid you already know the answer, elantach. You just cannot accept it." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a mixture of sorrow and... sympathy?{/n} "Your predecessor, she who previously owned this vessel and your entire protectorate. The mon-keigh who kept a piece of my homeworld in her study, like a trifle or trophy of no great significance."

languages.text: "Bu sorunun cevabını biliyorsun elantach. Sadece hakikati kabul edemiyorsun." {n}Yrliet sana hüzünlü bir bakış atıyor. Bakışları sanki biraz da sempatik...{/n} "Senden önce bu geminin ve tüm protektoranın sahibi olan selefin. Çalışma odasında ana yurdumun bir parçasını âdeta ucuz bir süs eşyası, pek manası olmayan bir ganimet gibi saklayan mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: "I am afraid you already know the answer, elantach. You just cannot accept it." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a mixture of sorrow and... sympathy?{/n} "Your predecessor, she who previously owned this vessel and your entire protectorate. The mon-keigh who kept a piece of my homeworld in her study, like a trifle or trophy of no great significance."

traits.locale_text: "Ne yazık ki cevabı zaten biliyorsun elantach. Sadece hakikati kabul edemiyorsun." {n}Yrliet, sana hüzünle karışık bir bakış atıyor. İçinde sempati mi var?{/n} "Senden önce bu geminin ve tüm protektoranın sahibi olan selefin. Çalışma odasında ana yurdumun bir parçasını âdeta ucuz bir süs eşyası, pek manası olmayan bir ganimet gibi saklayan mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
